title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 8-1.5 - Doors and gates
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 8-1.5 - Doors and gates

State Regulations
(a) All elevator car and hoistway doors and gates shall be closed before the car
leaves a landing. Exception:Self-closing hoistway doors and gates. (b) No hoistway door or gate shall
be wedged or otherwise fastened in an open position. (c) All hoistway doors and gates and their
equipment shall be maintained in an operative condition. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
8-1.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
